document.full_text: iran's nuclear negotiator has said the next talks with world powers must be held without pressure, which analysts said indicated tehran would stick to its refusal to address its uranium enrichment drive.
document.title: iran tells eu next atom talks must be without pressure
lines_and_colors: iran's nuclear negotiator has said the next talks with world powers must be held without pressure, which analysts said indicated tehran would stick to its refusal to address its uranium enrichment drive.
